Main

Class Wall

  • java.lang.Object
    • Main.Wall

  • public class Wall
extends java.lang.Object
    Set of methods to create wall shaped StaticBodys.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Wall() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static city.cs.engine.StaticBody addWall(city.cs.engine.World world, float xFloat, float yFloat, float changeW)
      Creates a fixed size wall object which consists of a BoxShape and a StaticBody, but the width of the wall can be changed.
      static city.cs.engine.StaticBody makeCorner(city.cs.engine.World world, float xFloat, float yFloat, int theta, float triangleScale)
      Creates a triangular shaped object to fit into corners to prevent the box from getting stuck.
      static void makeJumps(city.cs.engine.World world, float xFloat, float yFloat)
      Creates a set of platforms consisting of a BoxShape and a StaticBody.
      static city.cs.engine.StaticBody makeWall(city.cs.engine.World world, float wFloat, float hFloat, float xFloat, float yFloat)
      Creates a wall object which consists of a BoxShape and a StaticBody.

      • makeWall

        public static city.cs.engine.StaticBody makeWall(city.cs.engine.World world,
                                                 float wFloat,
                                                 float hFloat,
                                                 float xFloat,
                                                 float yFloat)
        Creates a wall object which consists of a BoxShape and a StaticBody.
        Parameters:
        world - current level.
        wFloat - the width.
        hFloat - the height.
        xFloat - the x coordinate.
        yFloat - the y coordinate.
        Returns:
        the StaticBody.

      • makeJumps

        public static void makeJumps(city.cs.engine.World world,
                             float xFloat,
                             float yFloat)
        Creates a set of platforms consisting of a BoxShape and a StaticBody.
        Parameters:
        world - current level.
        xFloat - the x coordinate.
        yFloat - the y coordinate.

      • makeCorner

        public static city.cs.engine.StaticBody makeCorner(city.cs.engine.World world,
                                                   float xFloat,
                                                   float yFloat,
                                                   int theta,
                                                   float triangleScale)
        Creates a triangular shaped object to fit into corners to prevent the box from getting stuck. Consists of a PolygonShape and a StaticBody.
        Parameters:
        world - the current level.
        xFloat - the x coordinate.
        yFloat - the y coordinate.
        theta - the angle of rotation in degrees.
        triangleScale - - a multiplier to scale the object.
        Returns:
        the StaticBody.

      • addWall

        public static city.cs.engine.StaticBody addWall(city.cs.engine.World world,
                                                float xFloat,
                                                float yFloat,
                                                float changeW)
        Creates a fixed size wall object which consists of a BoxShape and a StaticBody, but the width of the wall can be changed.
        Parameters:
        world - the current level.
        xFloat - the x coordinate.
        yFloat - the y coordinate.
        changeW - a multiplier to change the width of the wall.
        Returns:
        the StaticBody
